description: [Raspberry Robin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1130) uses a RunOnce Registry key for persistence, where the key is removed after its use on reboot then re-added by the malware after it resumes execution.(Citation: Microsoft RaspberryRobin 2022)

external_references.description: Microsoft Threat Intelligence. (2022, October 27). Raspberry Robin worm part of larger ecosystem facilitating pre-ransomware activity. Retrieved May 17, 2024.
